data.title: 4 Biotechs That Have More Than Doubled Thanks to Coronavirus
data.text: Stocks of several small biotech companies more than double so far this year as they taste success in their efforts to make a vaccine/medicine for treating COVID-19.

data.title: 3 Absurdly Overvalued Stocks to Avoid During a Market Crash
data.text: Now is the time to take profits on these three high-flying growth stocks in case of a stock market crash.

data.title: Moderna Stock Looks Like a Winner as the Covid-19 Vaccine Race Loosens
data.text: Moderna looks like it has a winner with its Covid-19 vaccine. MRNA stock could make $35 billion if it delivers 1 billion doses, making its $26 billion market cap look cheap.

data.title: COVID-19 vaccine verdicts loom as next big market risk
data.text: Optimism that vaccines are on the way to end the coronavirus pandemic has been a major factor in this year’s U.S. stock resurgence.
